long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enhances cyber hygiene by verifying if URLs and HREFs match before clicking. It checks for discrepancies that could indicate malicious redirects, helping users avoid dangerous sites. By ensuring consistency between the visible link and its destination, the extension safeguards against phishing attempts, providing an extra layer of protection for safe browsing.
